rules: Use Outfit for all Headings (h1-h3) and Stats/Currency display.
Use Manrope for body text, forms, and small UI elements.
Never use pure black text. Use soft charcoal #1A1C1E.

usage_rules.background: Use #FDFCF8 for the main app background (Milk White).
usage_rules.cards: Use #FFFFFF with subtle border and shadow for content cards.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure headings are #0F172A and body is #334155.
usage_rules.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients of Primary-50 to White for hero sections. No harsh linear gradients.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.default: bg-white border-neutral-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/20 shadow-lg z-50 h-16 md:hidden flex justify-around items-center

visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary actions (shadow-emerald-500/20).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for overlays, modals, and sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle noise texture to the #FDFCF8 background to make it feel organic.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}

universal_guidelines: Do not use dark mode toggle. Enforce light mode 'Milk Theme'.
Ensure all numbers (USDT, Levels) are Monospace or Manrope for alignment.
Use Skeleton loaders for all data fetching states.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
